reference: Auerbach, Alan, Laurence Kotlikoff, and David Weil (1992). The Increasing Annuitization of the Elderly: Estimates and Implications for Intergenerational Transfers, Inequality, and National Saving, NBER Working Paper 4182, Cambridge, MA.
